body.p: The status bar is located at the bottom of the BTS program.
To the right of this icon, the position of the currently selected database object in the Navigator tree is displayed.

To the right of this icon, a status messege is displayed, e.g. the position of your coursor in a selected text (line number, column (= position in line), unicode) or the information that database objects are suppressed because you do not have the specific rights to see them. Clicking on the icon will display a window with the last 25 status messages.
